      • weightedSum

        public static Point weightedSum(double weightA,
                                Point a,
                                double weightB,
                                Point b)
        Adds the given points a and b, weighted by the respective weight, i.e.:
        weightA * a + weightB * b
        Attention! z may be NaN -- in this case, the weighted sum for z will be NaN too.
        Parameters:
        weightA - scalar weight of vector a
        a -
        weightB - scalar weight of vector b
        b -
        Returns:
        weightA * a + weightB * b

      • dotProduct

        public static double dotProduct(Point a,
                                Point b)
        Computes the dot product of the given two points
        Parameters:
        a -
        b -
        Returns:
        a * b (i.e. a.x*b.x + a.y*b.y + a.z * b.z)
